metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5881 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.9.0 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to charts.swf, a similarissue to CVE-2010-4207.

criterions.comment: yui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
